Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/Archer
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Archer, Canal, Cermak and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/Archer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Archer, Canal, Cermak and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/Archer.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th/75th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 75th/Lakefront
ShortDescription: Westbound 75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, South Shore, 76th, Coles and 75th, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, South Shore, 76th, Coles and 75th, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
